Package org.forgerock.openam.uma.rest

Class PolicyGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.uma.rest.PolicyGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResourceHandler, org.forgerock.util.promise.ExceptionHandler<org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException>, org.forgerock.util.promise.ResultHandler<org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResponse>
    public class PolicyGraph
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResourceHandler, org.forgerock.util.promise.ExceptionHandler<org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException>, org.forgerock.util.promise.ResultHandler<org.forgerock.json.resource.QueryResponse>
    Graph representation of the policy engine policies that represent all UMA policies for a single resource set.

    Clients should construct the object with the Resource representation of the policies, then call the computeGraph() method before using the other public methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PolicyGraph​(ResourceSetDescription resourceSet)
      Construct a new instance to evaluate and update the graph of rights within the policy engine.

    • Method Detail

      • handleResource

        public boolean handleResource​(org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse policy)

      • computeGraph

        public void computeGraph()
        Computes the graph of rights contained within the policy engine policies.

      • update

        public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<List<List<org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse>>,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException> update​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                                                                                                                                               PolicyResourceDelegate policyResourceDelegate)
        Update the policy engine's policies so that they correctly reflect the state of the rights graph. Any users for whom the current policies are invalid (incorrectly either active or inactive based on entitlements) will be iterated over, moving scopes to the appropriate state based on that updated entitlement.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context, for updates being made.
        policyResourceDelegate - The delegate to use for updating the policy engine.
        Returns:
        A promise for all the updates made.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Get the validity state of the policy rights graph.
        Returns:
        true if the policies correctly represent the rights graph, or false if updates are needed for that to be the case.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If computeGraph() has not yet been called.

      • handleException
